pages.text: $(li)The Quick Charge enchantment can be applied in a Crossbow.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the reload speed of Crossbows.
pages.title: Quick Charge

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Quick Charge).
